channel.title: Controllers with Forms :: Java Web Development
channel.description: Sending Form Data - Video Note The starter code for this video is found in the path-variables branch of the hello-spring repo. The final code presented in this video is found on the forms branch . As always, code along to the videos on your own hello-spring project. Sending Form Data - Text What if we want to send over some form data? To send data via a simple form in Spring Boot, weâ€™ll set things up like this:
